dc:title: On Pilgrimage - February 1967
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Remembers the work of A.J. Muste for peace and justice at his death. Supports demonstrators against the Vietnam War who disrupt a Mass, saying, however, she would not have participated. Regrets her age keeps her from working for peace in Vietnam as a nurse.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 847 1967-02-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
